name: tm86
effect: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.
